TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ParserErrorCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class ParserErrorCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class ParserErrorCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

summary.span: 管理分析过程中检测到的一组分析器错误。

span.span: Manages a set of parser errors detected during parsing.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供可用于管理对象集合的方法和属性。 The class provides methods and properties that you can use to manage a collection of objects. 例如, 你可以在分析时向集合添加一组分析器错误, 同时使用自定义对象来报告分析期间捕获的所有分析异常。For example, you can add a set of parser errors to a collection upon parsing while using a custom object to report all parse exceptions caught during parsing. 若要将分析器错误添加到, 请将其从集合中移除, 或在集合中找到它们, 并使用以下内容:To add parser errors to, remove them from, or locate them in a collection, use the following: - 向集合中添加单个对象的方法。The method to add a single object to the collection. - 向集合中添加多个对象的方法。The methods to add multiple objects to the collection. - 方法和属性 (即索引器) 可将单个对象添加到集合中的指定索引处。 Both the method and the property, which is the indexer, to add a single object to the collection at the specified index. 此外, 还可以使用类来执行以下操作:Additionally, you can use the class to do the following: - 用方法删除对象 。Remove objects with the method. - 使用方法检查集合中是否有特定的。 Check whether a particular is in the collection by using the method. - 使用方法查找对象在 集合中的位置。Find where a object is located in the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/CS/ParserErrorCollection_CS.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/VB/ParserErrorCollection_VB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将对象的数组添加到集合中。 The constructor adds an array of objects to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将现有对象添加到集合中。 Use the method to add an existing object to the collection. 不能将同一个对象多次添加到集合中。You cannot add the same object to the collection more than once. 当使用集合中已经存在的对象调用方法时, 添加将失败并返回-1。When you call the method using a object that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned. 若要将多个对象添加到集合, 请使用方法。To add multiple objects to the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何向 对象添加对象。The following code example demonstrates how to add a object to a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能将同一个对象多次添加到集合中。You cannot add the same object to the collection more than once. 不过, 尝试多次添加对象将不会引发异常。However, attempting to add a object more than once will not throw an exception. 相反, 添加将失败。Instead, the addition will fail. 在这种情况下 , 该方法将返回值-1。In this case, the method will return a value of -1. 但是, 和方法没有返回值。However, the and methods do not have return values. 使用其中一种方法添加对象时, 请使用方法来确定特定对象是否已存在于集合中。When adding objects by using one of these methods, use the method to determine whether a particular object is already in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在对象中搜索指定对象的实例。The following code example demonstrates how to search for an instance of a specified object in a object. summary.span: 将集合中的 对象复制到兼容的一维数组（从目标数组的指定索引处开始）。

span.span: Copies the objects in the collection to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可从指定索引处开始, 将集合中的对象 (包括所包含的项引用) 复制到兼容的数组。 Use the method to copy the objects in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index. 如果要 使用方法对集合中的对象进行排序, 此方法非常有用。This is useful when you want to sort the objects in the collection by using the method. 具体方法为：To do this: 1. 将对象复制到兼容的数组中。Copy the objects into a compatible array. 2. 对数组进行排序。Sort the array. 3. 使用方法可从集合中移除所有对象。 Use the method to remove all the objects from the collection. 4. 使用方法将已排序的数组添加回集合。Use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将对象的内容复制到指定的数组。The following code example demonstrates how to copy the contents of a object to the specified array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将现有对象插入到集合中的特定索引处。 Use the method to insert an existing object at a particular index within the collection. 不能将同一个对象多次添加到集合中。You cannot add the same object to the collection more than once. 当使用集合中已有的调用方法时, 插入操作将失败。When you call the method by using a that is already in the collection, the insertion fails. 使用插入前的方法来确定集合中是否已存在特定的。Use the method before the insertion to determine whether a particular is already in the collection. 若要在集合中重新定位, 必须先使用方法将其移除, 然后使用将其插入到所需的索引处。To reposition a within the collection, you must first remove it by using the method and then insert it at the desired index by using . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 集合中的指定索引处插入对象。The following code example demonstrates how to insert a object at the specified index in a collection.
